TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ItemAutomationPeer extends System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer implements class System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IVirtualizedItemProvider
Public MustInherit Class ItemAutomationPeer Inherits AutomationPeer Implements IVirtualizedItemProvider
type ItemAutomationPeer = class inherit AutomationPeer interface IVirtualizedItemProvider

summary.span: 將 集合中的資料項目公開至使用者介面自動化。

span.span: Exposes a data item in an collection to UI Automation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料項目未同時型別沒有子系; 不過，它們可以有樹狀目錄和對應[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]樹狀目錄中。Data items that are not also types do not have children; however, they can have a tree and a corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree. 比方說，可以擁有包含資料項目的字串集合。For example, a can have a collection of strings that contain data items. 當這些項目會處理視覺效果，為他們建立樹狀結構。When those items are processed by an for visualization, a tree is created for them. 此樹狀結構可以具有對應[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]樹狀目錄中。This tree can have a corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree. 建立樹狀結構之後，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]合併到樹狀結構[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]樹狀目錄中。After the tree is created, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] merges the tree into a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree. 適用於其對應項目，如果存在，以取得詳細資訊，關於樹狀目錄中。 works with its counterpart, if it exists, to obtain more information about the tree. 只顯示資料的項目，或更精確地說，對應樹狀結構，具有此 dualism。Only visible data items, or more precisely, the corresponding trees, have this dualism. 非看有沒有對應的資料項目樹狀結構，只能有一個。Non-visible data items, which have no corresponding trees, have only one .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如同一般的使用者用來說明他們要參考哪些控制項的文字字串，您可以將名稱屬性。You can think of the name property as if it were a string of text that users use to explain which control they are referring to. 請確定您擁有中的所有控制項的文字表示[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)]，讓您可以以程式設計方式，以當地語系化的方式參考控制項。Make certain that you have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner. 這個方法是由 所呼叫。This method is called by .

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IVirtualizedItemProvider.Realize() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 允許將虛擬項目當做使用者介面自動化項目完整存取。

span.span: Makes the virtual item fully accessible as a UI Automation element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
